meta.description: Cathay Pacific The Pier First Class Lounge at Hong Kong International Airport (HKG), Terminal 1. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Cathay Pacific The Pier First Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: Located at Gate 63 in the North West Concourse.

location.description: Chek Lap Kok, Hong Kong, China

lounge.description: Welcome to The Pier First Class Lounge, Cathay Pacific's newest flagship lounge at Hong Kong International Airport. Measuring 2,061 square metres with a seating capacity of 231, the new space expresses the the heartfelt warmth, considered simplicity, and contemporary Asian values at the heart of Cathay Pacific's new brand design ethos.

reviews.content: Beautiful lounge - probably the best I’ve ever seen. Everything is accounted for and no detail overlooked.
A beautiful lounge but the recent change in food provider has clearly impacted quality. Still well worth a visit but arrive early if you want to book a spa treatment. 4 hour waits by early afternoon.
Wonderful, tranquil oasis in the middle of the HK airport. Bar with a great cocktail selection, restaurant with à la carte and spa with foot massage - although they were fully booked during our stay.
This lounge is our favourite so far in the world! The staff are beyond helpful, the food in the dining room is outstanding and the shower facilities-better than most hotels!
Restaurant is highly disorganised. Lost my order and made me wait for an hour only to deliver incorrect food. Nice lounge but service sub-optimal.
Easily one of the best lounges in the world. The day beds, spa services, and dining room service are all phenomenal.
I’d say alongside the Qantas SYD F, Emirates F and Turkish IST CIP lounge, this is one of the best so far!!!
Probably the best lounge I’ve been to in the world. (Up there with QF 1st in SYD)
This place is spectacular. Nicest lounge I've ever been in, including the Emirates business lounge in Dubai.
The coziest, most homely, lounge I’ve ever been to. It feels more like a massive living room with impeccable service. Don’t forget to try one of the “escapade” rooms with fantastic tarmac view.
Great lounge, with a very calm vibe. The separate restaurant is lovely and saves having smelly food elsewhere. Get there early if you want a massage though.
Great food, sit down restaurant or snacks. Full cocktail menu. Massages and facials. Lounge is not crowded and the furniture is snazzy.
Gorgeous lounge, very comfortable.
Don't leave it to the last hour before your flight to relax. This is a wonderful lounge. Plenty of space and great bar service. Best lounge in HK airport.
By far one of the best lounges out there. Sit down dining, foot massages, day rooms and excellent amenities.
Accessed with One World Emerald status. Very quiet lounge with separate areas for bar, snacks, lounge area. Also quiet cubical for phone, spa/shower and sit-down dining. Plenty of space, and seating.
Truly incredible lounge. Great food, service, bar, showers. Nice sit down dining. If you want a buffet run to the business class lounge and then come back. Incredible tarmac view.
Superb lounge.. Comfortable oasis. Full service dining option plus mini spa.
Great lounge. A la carte food options are good and the shower rooms are great. Nice balcony view over the terminal. I am always sad it doesn't have the noodle bar of the business class lounge though.
Well designed comfortable lounge. Good food in restaurant, great bar, excellent spacious well appointed showers. Only minor gripes are decor in restaurant, and lack of vintage champagne!
Oasis spa. Staff sincere, attentive, welcoming. Food outstanding. Shower suites spacious. Comfortable rooms & furnishings. Everything about this lounge says "Respite". My favorite worldwide.
Fab new lounge - worth the schlep!!
Luxurious is the only way to describe it.
Just wow! This lounge is incredible, somewhere you could easily stay for hours on end. A full service a la carte restaurant make the experience even better. Much better than the Wing First.
Best lounge I've ever been to in the world. It's a bit far from security but worth the trek if you have access. Free massage. Free full service formal meals. Great bar. Day beds.
The decor & colors feel a bit "early 90s," (clearly that's nitpicky, haha). It's a fantastic lounge; day suites provide a private spot for quality rest.
Best lounge I've ever been at. Food to order is incredible. Free foot massage (2 hr wait though). Staff everywhere. The day suites are overrated.
The best lounge I've ever visited in the world thus far. Amazing shower room, foot massage and full restaurant. Everything is stunning! Top notch service all around. I want to stay longer!
Beautiful new remodel. Furnishings are amazing and a la carte menu is great.
First class lounge full so we had to go to business lounge which was also full. Standing with 2 kids is not acceptable. Need a larger lounge..
Simply one of the best lounges in the world. Understated, warm, and chock full of all the best amenities you'd expect in a first class lounge. Excellent all around!
This is a beautiful, spacious space. The finishes are warm, and the lounge itself feels very luxurious.
Everything is excellent about this lounge: dining/drink quality, shower facilities, & service. It is also very spacious. One of the very few lounges around the world that I would rate 4 stars.
Newest and best first lounge in Asia Pacific hands down. In the same league as Qantas F lounge in SYD and MEL. Fantastic sit down menu in the restaurant and awesome homely decor.
Best OW lounge in Asia by far.
Good new addition in HK. Great food at the restaurant, and the day suites offer something different to the Cabanas at The Wing lounge - quiet, comfortable spots, with view of the tarmac.
One of the best lounges out there. Complimentary dining, drinks, snacks, and foot massage. Desk and computer area for work is great as well. Just awesome.
This is truly one of the best lounges in the world.  The furnishings are great, the environment is stylish, yet functional, and the attention to detail is second to none.  When can I move in?
The ultimate lounge. Massive. Amazing views. Showers. Day suites. A full dining room which serves 4 course meals. Incredible shower facilities. The best of the best.
A fantastic new First Lounge that really rivals the Qantas First Lounges. Great style, ambiance and food, definitely worth making the time to enjoy :)
New lounge of Cathay Pacific Airways in HK airport.
Beautiful lounge, fabulous food and great service, if only all lounges could be like this.
Recently renovated and reopened in June 2015. This first class lounge basically sets the standard. Full service restaurant, free massages, and shower areas. It's like a mini-vacation.
Very comfortable overall. Seems nothing to complain.
Great food, and foot massages!
